page.title: 10Our May Revels.
page.content: It is our tradition to have{May Revels every year.At this ceremony there is a May Queen and a Green King who watch all kinds of dancing including: {Maypole,Morris and other country {dances }.All the children's Mums and Dads come to watch and to buy from the many stalls.Maybe their child is one of the May Queen's attendants or even the Queen herself.Years ago this ceremony was carried out by the local secondary school and when they could no longer do this my school, {St.Nicholas J.M.I.}carried on the tradition.This May I felt very nervous because I was the May Queen for 1985 and when I had the crown put on my head I was worried that it might fall off.After it was all over I felt better and very proud.I wish good luck to all the May Queens and Green Kings that follow me. By Niki Redding.
